amendment.description: To improve coordination between Federal and State agencies and the Do Not Pay working system.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3702 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3702 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 3748. To improve coordination between Federal and State agencies and the Do Not Pay working system.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3702 proposed by Senator Wicker for Senator Kennedy to Amendment SA 3748.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3702 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
